text: kya tumane dekha nahin ki allaah ne, jo kuchh aakaashon mein aur jo kuchh dharatee mein hai, sabako tumhaare kaam mein laga rakha hai aur usane tumapar apanee prakat aur aprakat anukampaen poorn kar dee hai? isapar bhee kuchh log aise hai jo allaah ke vishay mein bina kisee gyaan, bina kisee maargadarshan aur bina kisee prakaashamaan kitaab ke jhagadate hai
